articles.title: High five! Superb Dressel takes fifth gold to cap historic Olympic performance - The Guardian

articles.author: DAVID LEE
articles.title: Olympics: US swim star Caeleb Dressel ends Tokyo 2020 with five golds - The Straits Times
articles.description: America finish top of the meet with 11 titles, two clear of second-place Australia.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: TOKYO - American Caeleb Dressel has lived up to great expectations by leading his country to gold in the Olympics men's 4x100m medley relay in a new world world of 3min 26.78sec on Sunday (Aug 1) and… [+998 chars]

articles.title: Majority of COVID-19 cases at large public events were among vaccinated Americans: CDC study - CTV News
articles.description: A new study by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention showed that three-quarters of individuals who became infected with COVID-19 at public events in a Massachusetts county had been fully vaccinated.

articles.author: Julie Bosman, Jan Hoffman, Margot Sanger-Katz, Tim Arango
articles.title: Who Are the Unvaccinated in America? There’s No One Answer. - The New York Times
articles.description: One segment of people who have avoided shots is vehemently opposed to the idea. But there is a second group, surveys suggest, that is still deciding.
articles.content: Yet she is in no hurry to receive a vaccine until she can discuss it with the doctor who treated her cancer at their next appointment. Her employer has asked her to be vaccinated and is pressuring he… [+1231 chars]
